title: Líderes del PRM responden a Abinader: Freno al proselitismo en entidades públicas
content: El presidente Luis Abinader lanzó una clara advertencia a los aspirantes presidenciales: no tolerará campañas políticas desde las instituciones del Estado. Esta contundente declaración generó una inmediata oleada de respuestas de los principales líderes del Partido Revolucionario Moderno (PRM). Respaldo Unánime desde la Cúpula del Gobierno David Collado, una de las figuras destacadas del PRM, fue de los primeros en manifestar su apoyo. A través de su cuenta de X, publicó que respaldan «firmemente el llamado del presidente @luisabinader a que los funcionarios, nos concentremos en nuestras responsabilidades y nos abstengamos del proselitismo público». Collado enfatizó el enfoque de su agenda en el trabajo nacional. Respaldamos firmemente el llamado del presidente @luisabinader a que los funcionarios, nos concentremos en nuestras responsabilidades y nos abstengamos del proselitismo público. Como lo hemos manifestado públicamente y en la práctica, estamos enfocados en nuestra agenda nacional... La vicepresidenta Raquel Peña también se sumó públicamente al respaldo. Ella aplaudió y apoyó las declaraciones de Abinader, indicando que «deben cesar todas las actividades proselitistas y que ningún funcionario debe utilizar su cargo para promover aspiraciones políticas ni fungir como jefe de campaña desde el Gobierno». Aplaudo y respaldo las declaraciones del presidente @LuisAbinader , en las que establece que deben cesar todas las actividades proselitistas y...

title: Volkswagen Tera chega em 2025: preços acessíveis desafiam Nivus e rivais
creator: Redação Portal
content: A Volkswagen anunciou o lançamento do Tera, um SUV compacto de entrada que promete agitar o mercado brasileiro a partir do segundo semestre de 2025, com preços estimados abaixo de R$ 100.000 na versão inicial. Produzido em São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo, o modelo chega para competir diretamente com o já consolidado Nivus, também da marca alemã, e rivais como Fiat Pulse e Renault Captur. Enquanto o Tera foca em acessibilidade e eficiência, o Nivus mantém a aposta em potência e tecnologia. A disputa interna levanta a curiosidade dos consumidores: qual SUV será a melhor escolha? A chegada do Tera reforça a estratégia da Volkswagen para dominar o segmento de SUVs, que representa 40% das vendas de veículos leves no Brasil. O Tera será oferecido com motores 1.0 aspirado e 1.0 turbo, mirando consumidores urbanos e compradores de primeira viagem. Já o Nivus, com seu motor 1.0 turbo de 128 cv, atrai quem busca desempenho. Ambos compartilham a plataforma MQB-A0, mas diferem em proposta e equipamentos. Essa competição interna da Volkswagen reflete a demanda crescente por SUVs compactos no país, com consumidores atentos a custo, consumo e tecnologia. O mercado de SUVs compactos no Brasil é movido por preços atrativos, e o Tera entra na disputa com uma proposta agressiva. A versão de entrada, equipada com motor 1.0 aspirado e câmbio manual, deve custar menos de R$ 100.000, segundo estimativas do setor. Configurações topo de linha, com motor 1.0 turbo e câmbio...

title: Trading Corporation of Pakistan, private sector granted major tax exemptions on sugar imports
creator: News Desk
content: The Federal Board of Revenue (FBR) has granted major tax exemptions to the Trading Corporation of Pakistan (TCP) and the private sector for the import of 500,000 metric tons of sugar. The FBR’s latest decision includes an exemption from customs duty on the specified quantity of sugar, alongside a reduction in the sales tax rate, which has been cut from 18% to 0.25%. Additionally, the withholding tax has been reduced to 0.25% on sugar imports by both the Trading Corporation of Pakistan (TCP) and the private sector.In a series of notifications issued on Wednesday — SRO.1215(I)/2025, S.R.O. 1216(I)/2025, and SRO.1217(I)/2025 — the FBR also waived a 3% minimum value-added tax (VAT) on the import of up to 500,000 metric tons of sugar. These changes apply to both commercial imports of crystalline sugar, with specific conditions attached.The revised tax and duty exemptions are designed to facilitate sugar imports through TCP or the private sector, with a deadline for the imports set for September 30, 2025. The Commerce Division will oversee the process, ensuring quality assurance via an international inspection firm. The move follows the Cabinet’s approval to ensure the availability of sugar at competitive prices.On July 8, the federal cabinet approved the import of 500,000 tons of sugar in a bid to address supply gaps and stabilise prices amid growing concerns over inflation and commodity shortages.The Ministry of National Food Security and Research said that the sugar will be...

title: Procuraduría investiga si Alfredo Saade se extralimitó en sus funciones en el caso de los pasaportes
creator: Periodista
content: Este miércoles, la Procuraduría General de la Nación ordenó la apertura de una investigación disciplinaria contra Luis Gilberto Murillo Urrutia y Laura Camila Sarabia Torres, en su condición de exministros de Relaciones Exteriores, y Alfredo Saade Vergel, actual jefe de despacho presidencial, “por las presuntas irregularidades en que incurrieron para garantizar la elaboración y distribución de los pasaportes de los colombianos”. La Sala Disciplinaria de Instrucción del ente de control, indicó que, posiblemente, en el caso de Murillo y Sarabia, “no estructuraron de manera eficiente y oportuna el proceso durante el tiempo que cada uno ocupó la cartera ministerial, aunado al hecho de que en el caso de Murillo habría usado en forma indebida la figura de la declaratoria de urgencia manifiesta surtida en septiembre de 2024”. Confío en la investigación que adelanta la Procuraduría. Desde el 5 de marzo pedí expresamente su acompañamiento, así como el de la Contraloría. Todo el proceso ha sido trazable y documentado. Cada decisión que se tomó respondió a instrucciones del Presidente, con un único... En el caso de Sarabia Torres, el Ministerio Público indagará si la exfuncionaria conoció desde abril de 2025 “que el cronograma propuesto era inviable para la implementación del nuevo modelo, con ocasión del proceso adelantado con la Casa de la Moneda de Portugal, así como la falta de capacidad operativa de la Imprenta Nacional”. Sobre Saade, la Procuraduría...

title: 傳朱立倫擬不擋千億撥補台電 李彥秀喊人民非常厭惡:台電不能只要錢 | 政治 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM
content: 記者陳思妤/台北報導 ▲李彥秀今早站路口催不同意票,並接受媒體聯訪。(圖/翻攝畫面) 針對4100億「因應國際情勢強化經濟社會及國土安全韌性特別條例」,國民黨主席朱立倫喊出「各退一步」,國民黨要求普發現金,強化經濟預算則增為3200億。傳出,國民黨也將不再擋撥補台電的1000億預算。對此,國民黨立委李彥秀今(10)日稱,台電不能只要錢,不思考體質改善,人民對台電不斷撥補非常厭惡,「這確實是兩難的決定」,但藍白黨團最後一定會有一致決定。 傳出朱立倫態度轉彎,國民黨擬不再擋1000億撥補台電的預算,引起國民黨內部不滿。李彥秀今天找來台北市長蔣萬安一起站路口反罷免,被媒體問到此事時表示,朱立倫昨天並沒有特別談到1000億到底要不要撥補,但是最大問題還是企業界面臨關稅衝擊、台幣升值,如果再漲電價,企業界一定有壓力。 李彥秀指出,藍白黨團對於要不要撥補這件事最後一定會有一致討論,「這確實是兩難的決定」。她強調,最大問題是,去年台電虧損達到411億,2022年到現在撥補了4500多億,「台電不能只要錢,不思考體質改善」。 李彥秀表示,台電虧損的最大問題還是過去民進黨反核政策,把反核當神主牌,全世界潮流都在核能安全之下,開始使用核能,台電不能只要錢,不思考體質改善。她說,「人民對台電不斷撥補非常厭惡」,9月才會再開電價審議委員會,要不要漲價是10月的事情,大罷免跟台電要不要漲價是完全沒有關係的議題。

title: دمشق: نرحب بأى مسار مع "قسد" يعزز وحدة سوريا
content: أكدت الحكومة السورية، الأربعاء، ترحيبها بأي مسار مع قوات سوريا الديمقراطية "قسد" من شأنه الحفاظ على وحدة وسلامة أراضي البلاد، مجددة تمسكها بمبدأ "سوريا واحدة، جيش واحد، حكومة واحدة"، ورفضها لأي شكل من أشكال التقسيم أو الفدرلة. وقالت الحكومة السورية، في بيان نقلته وكالة الأنباء السورية "سانا"، إن دمشق تشكر الجهود الأمريكية المبذولة في رعاية تنفيذ الاتفاق مع قوات سوريا الديمقراطية "قسد"، مؤكدة حرصها على استقرار البلاد ووحدة شعبها. سوريا ترحب بانضمام مقاتلي "قسد" إلى صفوف الجيش وأضاف البيان، أن الدولة السورية ترحب بانضمام مقاتلي "قسد" إلى صفوف الجيش السوري ضمن الأطر القانونية والدستورية، مشددة على ضرورة عودة جميع مؤسسات الدولة إلى شمال شرق البلاد لضمان تقديم الخدمات الأساسية وتعزيز الاستقرار المجتمعي. وحذرت دمشق من أن أي تأخير في تنفيذ الاتفاقات الموقعة "يعقّد المشهد ولا يخدم المصلحة الوطنية"، معتبرة أن الرهان على المشاريع الانفصالية "رهان خاسر"، داعية جميع القوى الوطنية إلى توحيد الصفوف والعمل المشترك تحت راية الوطن. وجددت الحكومة السورية تأكيدها أن "المكون الكردي جزء أصيل من النسيج السوري"، وأن حقوق جميع السوريين "مصانة ضمن مؤسسات الدولة".

title: عاجل.. مصادر إسرائيلية: كتائب القسام تواصل جمع معلومات دقيقة وتنفيذ هجمات منظمة في غزة
content: حذرت مصادر أمنية إسرائيلية من استمرار "كتائب القسام" في تحقيق مكاسب ميدانية، حسبما أفاد موقع واللاه العبري. وأكدت المصادر أن الجناح العسكري نجح في جمع معلومات استخباراتية دقيقة عن انتشار وتحركات قوات جيش الدفاع الإسرائيلي على مختلف محاور القتال، ويعتمد في تنفيذ هجماته على تنوع تكتيكي يشمل نيران القناصة، إطلاق صواريخ مضادة للدبابات، وتفجير عبوات ناسفة عن بعد أو عبر أسلاك، إلى جانب استخدام أسلحة خفيفة وقذائف هاون. ووفقا للتقديرات الأمنية، فقد تمكنت القسام من تعيين قادة ميدانيين جدد لإدارة العمليات القتالية، حيث تدار المعارك من خلال تسلسل أوامر يبدأ من قيادة الحركة في مدينة غزة والمعسكرات المركزية، وصولا إلى مراكز القتال على الأرض. وفي السياق ذاته، حذر ضابط كبير في الاحتياط من خطورة تأثير الظروف المناخية القاسية في القطاع، مشيرا إلى أن حرارة الجو المرتفعة ونسبة الرطوبة العالية تصعّب استمرار القتال وتُسبب إرهاقا للمقاتلين، ما يؤدي إلى تراجع أدائهم العملياتي، ويمنح المقاتلين الفلسطينيين فرصا أكبر لتنفيذ هجمات مباغتة. وقتل نحو 65 جنديا إسرائيليا منذ بداية العام الحالي في معارك قطاع غزة، لحسب مصادر إسرائيلية.

title: بوليتيكو: ترامب لن يدعم تشديد العقوبات ضد روسيا إلا إذا منح صلاحية إلغائها لاحقا
content: ذكرت "بوليتيكو" أن الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب مستعد لدعم مشروع قانون تشديد العقوبات ضد روسيا، شريطة منحه صلاحيات أوسع تخوله إلغاءها لاحقا إذا قرر ذلك، دون موافقة الكونغرس. وأشارت الصحيفة إلى أن مشروع القانون المقترح، بصيغته الحالية، يمنح الرئيس الأمريكي صلاحية تعليق الرسوم الجمركية التي تصل نسبتها إلى 500%، لمدة 180 يوما على واردات الولايات المتحدة من الدول التي تواصل شراء النفط واليورانيوم الروسي. وأكدت مصادر مطلعة للصحيفة أن ترامب "لن يوقع على المشروع ما لم تمنح له صلاحيات أوسع بشأن آلية إلغاء العقوبات، تضمن له حرية القرار دون رقابة تشريعية". ونقلت "بوليتيكو" عن هذه المصادر قولها إن "الإدارة الأمريكية تسعى إلى تعديل المشروع بالشكل الذي يمنع الكونغرس من عرقلة أي قرار رئاسي في حال قرر ترامب لاحقا وقف العقوبات". من جهته، أعرب السيناتور الجمهوري ليندسي غراهام، أحد أبرز المشاركين في إعداد المشروع، والمدرج على القائمة الروسية للإرهابيين والمتطرفين، عن استعداده لإعادة النظر في النص القانوني بما يضمن للرئيس إمكانية إلغاء الرسوم المفروضة، شرط الحصول على موافقة الكونغرس. وكان ترامب قد أعلن في 8 يوليو أنه يدرس "بجدية كبيرة" إمكانية تمرير مشروع القانون، الذي قدمته مجموعة من أعضاء مجلس الشيوخ من الحزبين الجمهوري والديمقراطي في أبريل الماضي، بقيادة غراهام وزميله الديمقراطي ريتشارد بلومنثال. ويتضمن المشروع فرض عقوبات ثانوية تطال الشركاء التجاريين لروسيا، بالإضافة إلى رسوم جمركية مرتفعة بنسبة 500% على الواردات القادمة من دول تواصل شراء النفط والغاز واليورانيوم وسلع أخرى من روسيا. في المقابل، حذر السيناتور الجمهوري راند بول من ولاية كنتاكي من...

title: Large-Cap Cryptos Climb as Trump’s Tariff Threats Stir Market Uncertainty
creator: Republished By Echobase.ai
content: ETH, XRP, and SOL all see modest gains today, as total market cap dips.Major digital asset prices climbed higher on Wednesday, July 9, despite U.S. President Donald Trump’s ongoing tariff warnings, which have shaken investor sentiment. Bitcoin (BTC) traded just below $109,000 at press time, up just half a percent over the past 24 hours and 0.8% over the week. Ethereum (ETH) led the gains among the top-10 crypto assets by market capitalization, jumping 3.4% on the day to $2,650, and up a solid 7.3% in the past seven days. Solana (SOL) also posted gains, rising 2.5% to $154 on the day and up 2.6% for the week.BTC 24-hour price chart. Source: CoinGeckoXRP continued its upward trend since Ripple’s bank charter application news on Friday, gaining 4.1% in the last 24 hours to $2.39, with an over 8% weekly increase. Yesterday, news broke that President Trump’s social media platform Truth Social had filed for a “blue chip” crypto ETF that holds multiple top crypto assets, including BTC, ETH, SOL, and XRP, possibly also contributing to the mild gains.Despite gains among the big players today, the total crypto market capitalization fell 2.4% to $3.45 trillion, according to CoinGecko. Daily trading volume stood at $92.3 billion.Meanwhile, leveraged liquidations came in at $172 million on the day, according to CoinGlass data. ETH accounted for $56 million of the total, while BTC trailed with near $30 million. U.S. spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) attracted nearly $216 million...

title: Team India`s pace attack receives major boost after Jasprit Bumrah`s return
creator: Mid-day
content: Star speedster Jasprit Bumrah’s return at Lord’s will lend greater teeth to the Indian attack alongside Siraj and Akash Deep, just as Jofra Archer’s will buoy England, whose lack of firepower stood badly exposed with Woakes, Carse and Tongue being subjected to hours of toil at Edgbaston In the blue corner, after a one-Test absence, stands Jasprit Bumrah , chomping at the bit. In the red corner, for the first time in four years, looms the towering figure of Jofra Archer, desperate to reacquaint himself with the red-ball format. It’s a fascinating backdrop against which to kick off the third act of a compelling series at an iconic venue which is the stage for several of Indian cricket’s greatest triumphs. The Lord’s of today doesn’t bear too much resemblance to the ground where Kapil Dev ’s intrepid band turned the world order upside down on June 25, 1983 with their epochal conquest of mighty West Indies in the final of the last 60-over World Cup. There is a massive influx of the modern that has overrun the venue, but the old players’ balconies remain untouched. Maybe anywhere else, it might have appeared incongruous and out of place, but here, it seems perfectly natural for the old-world and the new-age to rub shoulders. Jofra Archer during England’s practice session at Lord’s yesterday Honours Board in sight Within the confines of the building that houses the dressing rooms and the Long Room populated by members of the Marylebone Cricket Club lie the Honours Boards that...

title: `Jasprit Bumrah is so accurate and has a very clear mind`: Rishabh Pant
creator: Mid-day
content: England have realised that it’s not easy to outbat their rivals on flat pitches and are thus banking on their pacers to tame the visitors on a greenish pitch Interestingly, the two players, who will be under intense scrutiny in the Third Test beginning at Lord’s on Thursday, are both spearheads of the bowling attacks of their respective teams. Of course, Jasprit Bumrah is returning to the Indian fold after resting in the second Test, but for Jofra Archer it’s a comeback after a long injury layoff of four years. There is no doubt with the wicket expected to help the seamers the two are expected to prop up the potency of their bowling unit by a long way. Pace battery charged After the stupendous performance by pacers Akash Deep and Mohammed Siraj at Edgbaston, the Indian team management is happy that Bumrah will bolster the attack at the iconic venue, where India will go all out for a win and strengthen their hold on the five-match series by taking a 2-1 lead. It’s England, who are more desperate for Archer’s return after their bowlers have not been able to contain the Indian batters, who are on a scoring spree getting over 1700 runs in the first two games. England have realised that it’s not easy to outbat their rivals on flat pitches and are thus banking on their pacers to tame the visitors on a greenish pitch. Of course with the weather predicted to be in the early 30 degrees, it’ll be interesting to see how the wicket behaves across five days and if it will be another...

title: Has BEST dropped its bus No. 1?
creator: Mid-day
content: Route from Colaba to Mahim, one of the oldest in city, is not in operation anymore; officials say it is being ‘restructured’, will return The Brihanmumbai Electric Supply and Transport (BEST) undertaking has discontinued one of its oldest routes — Bus Number 1, which used to operate between Colaba and Mahim. This route was also significant as it hosted Mumbai’s first double-decker bus, a Daimler-class vehicle, introduced in 1937. Historically, the route was numbered as Route A during the tram era and was later upgraded to Route Number 1. It used to run between Colaba and Mahim. Many old-timers are nostalgic about this route and have protested against its discontinuation,” said Suryakant Jadhav, a resident of Lalbaug. In recent years, the Tata electric bus was inaugurated on Route 1. Even during the post-lockdown period, when local trains were not operational for the general public, Route 1 was regularly operated using double-decker buses from the Colaba depot. One of the first buses on Route 1. Pic/BEST ARCHIVES Before the lockdown, a night version of Route 1 also operated. The night service — Bus 1 Ltd — ran from Colaba Depot to Santacruz Depot, cruising through the sleeping city. Bus enthusiasts referred to Route 1L and other night services as “vampire routes,” as they became active after sunset and ceased operations before sunrise. Originally, Route 1 operated from Colaba to Mahim . It was later extended to run from RC Church, Colaba to Bandra Reclamation Bus Station, and...

title: A to Z of Lord’s
creator: Mid-day
content: An alphabetical recall of Test matches at the spiritual headquarters of cricket Azharuddin. A bittersweet Lord’s Test in 1990 because Mohd Azharuddin won the toss and inserted the opposition. Thank you very much, said Graham Gooch as he and his fellow batsmen thrived. Azhar responded with a splendid hundred; according to him, his finest at the time. Bedi. Cricket manager Bishan Singh Bedi was not in favour of his captain Mohd Azharuddin’s decision to bat first at Lord’s in 1990 and Bedi’s disapproval reached the media. Cottari. Two brothers with the same first name figured in the 1936 Lord’s Test — all-rounder CK Nayudu and leg-spinner CS Nayudu. CK captained India in the inaugural Test in 1932, after which Wisden described him as “a man of high character and directness of purpose.” Dada. A Test debut to remember for Sourav ‘Dada’ Ganguly in 1996. Walking in at No. 3 for his first taste of Test cricket as a batsman, Ganguly hit an imperious 131. Fellow debutant Rahul Dravid missed his hundred by five runs in the same innings. A maiden Test century at Lord’s for Dravid came 15 years later in 2011. Edrich. England ’s No.3 batsman John Edrich missed his century by four runs when he was trapped LBW by Bedi in the 1974 Test. Had Edrich got to his hundred, he would have been the fourth centurion of the first innings after Dennis Amiss, Mike Denness, and Tony Greig. India’s Rahul Dravid works his way to a hundred in the 2011 Lord’s Test. PICS/GETTY IMAGES Forty-two. That’s all Ajit...

title: Olivia Rodrigo makes free therapy accessible for her band and crew
creator: Mid-day
content: Olivia's band member shared, 'On the Guts World Tour, Olivia and our tour manager, Marty Hom, made accessible and free therapy for all of the touring personnel. I have never had anything like that' Singer and actor Olivia Rodrigo has a heart of gold, and goes out of her way to care for her team. Her touring guitarist Daisy Spencer has revealed that the singer pays for her band and crew to have access to free therapy, both on and off tour. Spencer, 31, spoke about her experience working with the Grammy winner , 22, on a podcast. She said, “On the Guts World Tour, Olivia and our tour manager, Marty Hom, made accessible and free therapy for all of the touring personnel. I have never had anything like that. And that reignited the importance of therapy to me because I had fallen off [the wagon] for so long, and then suddenly I had this free resource of incredible therapists, and I utilised the crap out of that.” She continued, “Honestly, that was one of the coolest things that has ever happened on tour. One of the best things you can give to people is accessible free therapy, because it can get expensive.” As per reports, Spencer then detailed how having access to free therapy has impacted her life offstage. “I’m doing baby Daisy a good justice of finally getting to hear baby Daisy’s story of what they were going through when I was younger and everything. It’s been a gift for real. I feel like it is such a gift to be able to look within yourself and have someone else help you...

title: Black magic rituals have no place in 21st century
creator: Mid-day
content: This was placed at the crematorium grounds in Pimplasgaon village in Bhiwandi The police have arrested two men for allegedly performing black magic rituals at a crematorium in Thane district recently. According to reports, the matter came to light when a police patil, who is responsible for maintaining order within villages, assisting the police in investigations, and liaising between the administration and villagers, discovered two photographs of unidentified women pasted onto a lemon wrapped in black cloth. This was placed at the crematorium grounds in Pimplasgaon village in Bhiwandi . Police said two men had allegedly indulged in black magic at the site between June 29 and July 4. The men were arrested on Saturday and booked under the Maharashtra Prevention and Eradication of Human Sacrifice and other Inhuman, Evil and Aghori Practices and Black Magic Act . This is extremely necessary, and the punishment should send out a message that it is criminal to indulge, advocate or endorse mumbo jumbo. We have had instances where black magic allegations have been used to target women especially. Branded as witches, bad omens, bringers of disaster and death, these targets have to endure horrific humiliation, or even death. There have also been instances where children have been ‘sacrificed’ to appease something, as part of a ritual. Superstition can be extremely dangerous and so it is important that practising black magic be stopped at once. It is vital that we put science above...

title: Ed Sheeran adds yet another hobby as he turns painter
creator: Mid-day
content: Sheeran turned to painting as a “creative outlet” and set up a makeshift workshop in a disused car park in central London, the Sapphire singer shared his interest in painting began in 2019 English singer and songwriter Ed Sheeran , who has been getting a great response to his recently released track, Sapphire, is exploring new creative avenues. Sheeran turned to painting as a “creative outlet” and set up a makeshift workshop in a disused car park in central London. The singer, 34, has revealed that he has been making art whenever he is on a break from touring. He is now preparing to exhibit his first collection, which will be sold in aid of his Ed Sheeran Foundation charity. He said in a statement, “I started painting at the end of my Divide Tour in 2019 and it’s something that I’ve used as a creative outlet ever since. When I was growing up, my parents worked in art, so I’ve naturally always been interested in it, and I always enjoyed studying art at school. I was back and forth on tour last year, and I used a lot of my downtime in the UK to paint. I’d run to a disused car park in Soho each morning, paint and then run home. I’d do that daily until I headed back out on tour again.” Sheeran revealed that he was encouraged to show his first collection by artist Damien Hirst. He added, “I told my good friends Damien Hirst and Joe Hage about the paintings, and they encouraged me to do my own thing. So I decided to use it as a way of raising funds for my foundation, which...

title: Have you heard? Mukesh Chhabra on Ranbir`s casting as Lord Ram
creator: Mid-day
content: Ranbir Kapoor will be seen as Lord Rama in Nitesh Tiwari’s epic Ramayana, and those involved in the project say he was the obvious choice Wonder why Ranbir Kapoor is Rama? Nitesh Tiwari Ranbir Kapoor will be seen as Lord Rama in Nitesh Tiwari’s epic Ramayana, and those involved in the project say he was the obvious choice. Casting director Mukesh Chhabra recently shared that the actor’s calm expression, quiet intensity and childlike innocence are said to reflect the qualities the role demands. Known for his ability to convey emotion without theatrics, Ranbir is also described as someone unaffected by commercial pressures — an actor who simply wants to perform. The actor has been undergoing serious physical and mental preparation. He recently shared that he has given up alcohol and non-vegetarian food for the past six months as part of his transformation. A video of him training intensely for a leaner look has also gone viral, underscoring his commitment to the character. Produced by Namit Malhotra, Ramayana features Sai Pallavi as Sita, Sunny Deol as Hanuman, and Yash as Raavana. The two-part saga is slated to release on Diwali 2026 and 2027. The clash of the titans Akshay Kumar in Jolly LLB 2; (right) Rishab Shetty in Kantara Jolly LLB 3, starring Akshay Kumar and Arshad Warsi, is set to release in cinemas on October 2, aiming to capitalise on the Gandhi Jayanti holiday. While initially slated for a September 19 release, insiders reveal the team sees greater potential in...

title: Loffredo lanza advertencia a los criminales: «cárcel o Infierno»
creator: dmontalvo
content: A través de un video difundido por redes sociales, el ministro de Defensa, Gian Carlo Loffredo, envió un mensaje a los militares y policías de Ecuador en su enfrentamiento contra el terrorismo. El encargado colocó un mensaje directo: “Así juntos haremos que las calles del Ecuador vuelvan a su gente y los delincuentes vuelvan al único destino que les pertenece, la cárcel o el Infierno“, expresó Loffredo. El Ministro recordó que los uniformados tienen derecho de usas armas en uso legítimo de fuerza letal, por lo que amenazó a delincuentes que “actuarán con fuerza letal“.“Este país no le pertenece a 50 000 miserables, le pertenece a los 18 millones de ecuatorianos que anhelan vivir nuevamente en libertad”, mencionó el funcionario. “No nos va a temblar la mano para defender la vida de los ecuatorianos“, añadió.Loffredo expresó que el país está frente a un segundo aire «dentro de la guerra con el terrorismo. Por eso, les solicitó a los uniformados que utilicen sus armas con contundencia». “Háganle saber a los terroristas y a los narcotraficantes quienes son los que mandan, vayan y actúen con contundencia. Las leyes nos protegen, usen sus armas. Actúen de acuerdo a las nuevas reglas de enfrentamiento”, indicó Loffredo.The post Loffredo lanza advertencia a los criminales: «cárcel o Infierno» first appeared on La República EC.

title: Huye de la prensa alcaldesa sustituta de Tepalcatepec tras protesta
creator: Dalia Villegas Moreno/Quadratín Michoacán
content: MORELIA, Mich., 9 de julio de 2025.- El Congreso de Michoacán designó a Maricela Rangel López como presidenta municipal sustituta de Tepalcatepec, en relevo de la titular electa, quien fue asesinada.La decisión fue aprobada por la Septuagésima Sexta Legislatura tras analizar la propuesta presentada por la dirigencia estatal del Partido del Trabajo (PT), fuerza política que postuló originalmente a la alcaldesa ausente.La Comisión de Gobernación dictaminó que se cumplieron los extremos legales previstos por la Ley Orgánica Municipal, particularmente el artículo 66, que faculta al Congreso para designar sustitutos en casos de ausencia definitiva. Asimismo, se respetó el principio de origen partidista, como lo establece el marco normativo vigente.La solicitud fue turnada por el secretario municipal de Tepalcatepec, quien notificó al Congreso sobre la ausencia definitiva de la presidenta municipal. El oficio fue recibido en el Pleno el 3 de julio y turnado a la Comisión de Gobernación para su estudio.El 4 de julio se recibió la propuesta formal de la Coordinadora Estatal del PT, firmada por Reginaldo Sandoval Flores, Francisco Salguero Ruiz, María del Carmen Martínez Santillán y María del Auxilio Flores García, en la que se postuló a Maricela Rangel López como sustituta.De acuerdo con el dictamen, Rangel López cumple con los requisitos de elegibilidad establecidos en el artículo 119 de la Constitución local.Aprobado el decreto, deberá rendir protesta...

title: “Ningún ex Presidente debe quedar impune” Noroña
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: Ciudad de México .- En medio de la pesquisa que la FGR abrió en contra de Enrique Peña Nieto , el senador Gerardo Fernández Noroña afirmó que ningún ex Presidente debe quedar impune. “ La Fiscalía tiene abierta la investigación, vamos a ver qué sucede, a ver qué evidencias se entregan sobre el particular , pero yo creo que ningún acto de corrupción debe quedar impune, mucho menos un ex Presidente. Ya veremos qué sucede en el caso de Enrique Peña Nieto “, dijo. El senador explicó en entrevista que no podría decir que a Peña Nieto se le hubiera acabado “la impunidad”. “ Salió recientemente esta información, no había sido conocida, además por un diario israelí, según entiendo , no fue un diario nacional, de que recibió un soborno de 25 millones de dólares “, comentó. La víspera, el Fiscal Alejandro Gertz informó que la dependencia a su cargo pediría al Gobierno de Israel que aporte información sobre el presunto soborno de 25 millones de dólares que habría recibido Peña Nieto por la adquisición del sistema de espionaje Pegasus.

title: Maharashtra: Pune Police Constable suffers heart attack, dies on duty
creator: ANI
content: A police constable from the Bharati Vidyapeeth Traffic Division of Pune City Police collapsed while on duty and later passed away due to a heart attack, a senior Pune City police official said. According to the police, the incident occurred on Tuesday evening. According to a statement released by the Pune Police Commissionerate, Constable Dhanaji Bharat Vanve (42), attached to the Pune Traffic Branch, collapsed suddenly at Katraj Market Chowk around 6.45 pm while performing his traffic duty. He was immediately rushed to a nearby private hospital, but was declared dead before treatment could begin. Doctors cited a sudden and severe heart attack as the cause of death. Constable Vanve is survived by his parents, wife, daughter and son. Pune Police Commissioner Amitesh Kumar, along with senior officers, expressed deep sorrow over the incident and conveyed heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family. The Commissioner stated that the entire Pune Police force stands united in grief with the family and acknowledges Vanve’s dedicated service. The police force and colleagues paid a heartfelt tribute to the departed officer, praying for his soul to rest in eternal peace.

title: Cán bộ, công chức săn tìm thuê nhà gần công sở mới
content: Nhà nguyên căn, căn hộ mini “ cháy hàng” Những ngày qua, thị trường cho thuê nhà tại tỉnh Lâm Đồng , đặc biệt ở trung tâm hành chính của tỉnh trở nên sôi động khi lượng cán bộ, công chức, viên chức và người lao động chuyển đến làm việc ngày một nhiều. Nhiều người ưu tiên tìm thuê nhà nguyên căn hoặc căn hộ mini tại các khu vực gần cơ quan để thuận tiện di chuyển. Anh Sơn (cán bộ Cục thuế tỉnh Lâm Đồng) cho biết, anh vừa nhận công tác tại địa phương được một tuần. Vợ anh – chị Thảo cũng chuẩn bị chuyển về làm việc tại Lâm Đồng. Hiện anh vừa làm việc, vừa tranh thủ tìm nhà để ổn định nơi ở cho gia đình. Phòng khách của căn nhà anh Sơn thuê “Tôi vừa thuê được căn nhà nguyên căn giá 4,2 triệu đồng/tháng, mặc dù nhà nhỏ, hơi cũ nhưng chỉ cách cơ quan hơn 3km. Nhà có 2 phòng ngủ, khu vực an ninh nên phù hợp với nhu cầu của vợ chồng tôi”, anh Sơn chia sẻ. Hai vợ chồng cũng nhờ đồng nghiệp tìm trường học cho con trai chuẩn bị vào lớp 1 và bé nhỏ đang độ tuổi nhà trẻ. “May có đồng nghiệp hỗ trợ, chúng tôi sẽ sớm đưa các con lên để ổn định cuộc sống và công việc”, chị Thảo nói. Không chỉ các gia đình, nhiều cán bộ độc thân cũng lựa chọn thuê căn hộ mini để đảm bảo sự...

title: Mỹ sẽ áp thuế 50% đối với hàng nhập khẩu từ Brazil
content: Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump và Tổng thống Brazil Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva. (Ảnh: Getty Images) Mức thuế quan mới nhằm vào Brazil - dự kiến có hiệu lực ngày 1/8 - cao hơn nhiều so với mức thuế 10% mà Tổng thống Trump đưa ra vào ngày 2/4. Trong lá thư thông báo mức thuế mới gửi cho Tổng thống Brazil Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, ông Trump bày tỏ sự tức giận về cái mà ông gọi là chiến dịch " Săn phù thủy " nhằm vào cựu Tổng thống Brazil Jair Bolsonaro. Tổng thống Trump cũng ra lệnh cho văn phòng Đại diện Thương mại Mỹ mở một cuộc điều tra về “các hoạt động thương mại không công bằng của Brazil” theo Mục 301 Đạo luật Thương mại năm 1974. Cuộc điều tra có thể dẫn đến việc áp thêm thuế đối với hàng xuất khẩu của Brazil. Trước đó, trên mạng xã hội Truth, ông Trump cũng ban hành thông báo thuế quan đối với 7 đối tác thương mại nhỏ: Thuế quan 20% đối với hàng hóa từ Philippines, 30% đối với hàng hóa từ Sri Lanka, Algeria, Iraq và Libya, 25% đối với Brunei và Moldova. Các quốc gia này là những tác nhân nhỏ trong thâm hụt thương mại của Mỹ, chiếm chưa đến 15 tỷ đô la trong lượng hàng nhập khẩu vào Mỹ năm 2024. Trong khi đó, Brazil là đối tác thương mại lớn thứ 15 của Mỹ, với tổng kim ngạch thương mại hai chiều đạt...

title: Nhìn lại những diễn biến đáng chú ý tại phiên xét xử vụ Tập đoàn Phúc Sơn trước ngày tòa tuyên án
content: Ngày mai (11/7), TAND TP Hà Nội tuyên án bà Hoàng Thị Thúy Lan (cựu Bí thư Tỉnh ủy Vĩnh Phúc) ; ông Nguyễn Văn Hậu (Chủ tịch Tập đoàn Phúc Sơn) cùng 39 đồng phạm. Xuyên suốt phiên xử ghi nhận các bị cáo đều thành khẩn khai báo, họ đồng ý cáo trạng buộc tội, trình bày tình tiết giảm nhẹ mong được hưởng chính sách khoan hồng. Các bị cáo tại phiên tòa. Cựu Bí thư Tỉnh ủy bị giày vò khi nhiều thế hệ quan chức vướng án Hôm khai mạc phiên tòa, bà Hoàng Thị Thúy Lan mặc chiếc áo màu xanh, được cảnh sát xếp ngồi hàng ghế cùng khoang lái trên xe đặc chủng có cán bộ "áp sát” hai bên. Khi dẫn giải lên phòng xét xử , khuôn mặt bà tái nhợt, bước đi không vững. Sau thời gian dài tạm giữ, dáng người cựu Bí thư gầy hơn, mái tóc ngả bạc. Luật sư cho hay, bà Lan mắc một số bệnh như hội chứng ngưng thở, tim, đường ruột. Ông đề nghị tòa cho phép thân chủ của mình được ngồi khi cảm thấy mệt. Bà Hoàng Thị Thúy Lan bị dẫn giải lên hội trường xét xử. Trả lời xét hỏi, bà Lan trình bày rành mạch 3 lần nhận hối lộ của Nguyễn Văn Hậu. Trong đó, có dịp Hậu đến nhà chơi cho bà “mượn” 1 triệu USD. Vì muốn làm rõ khoản tiền là “mượn” hay “nhận hối lộ”, Hội đồng xét xử chất vấn bà Lan hai câu...

title: Thực phẩm cực tốt và 'đại kỵ' với người bị ung thư tuyến giáp
content: Ung thư tuyến giáp có xu hướng phát triển khi độ tuổi ngày càng cao, nguy cơ ở nữ giới cao hơn nam giới. Điều trị ung thư tuyến giáp thể biệt hóa bằng phương pháp phối hợp: Phẫu thuật cắt tuyến giáp, điều trị bằng thuốc phóng xạ i ốt (I-131) để tiêu diệt tế bào tuyến giáp tồn dư và tổ chức di căn nếu có, sau đó bổ sung hormon tuyến giáp. Dinh dưỡng trong bệnh ung thư tuyến giáp giai đoạn điều trị bằng I-131 Nguyên tắc dinh dưỡng Cung cấp đủ năng lượng 30-40 kcal/kg thể trọng/24h tùy mức độ lao động. Cung cấp đủ các chất dinh dưỡng, chất xơ, vitamin và khoáng chất Lượng nước: Tối thiểu 40ml/kg cân nặng/ngày (tăng nhu cầu nếu người bệnh bị sốt, nôn hoặc tiêu chảy...) để bảo vệ bàng quang và các mô khỏe mạnh khác. Lượng muối (không chứa i ốt): 6g/ngày. Không sử dụng thực phẩm có hàm lượng i ốt cao (trên 20μg/100g) với thời gian từ 2 đến 3 tuần trước và trong giai đoạn điều trị bằng i ốt 131. Lượng i ốt hạn chế <50 μg/ ngày. Khi bệnh ổn định, lượng i ốt không vượt quá nhu cầu khuyến nghị là 150μg/ngày. Vì sao phải ăn kiêng thực phẩm giàu i ốt? Chế độ ăn hạn chế i ốt là một chỉ định bắt buộc nhằm mục đích hạ thấp nồng độ i ốt trong máu để thuốc i ốt phóng xạ...

title: Dự án mở rộng cao tốc Yên Bái - Lào Cai sẽ hoàn thành trong năm 2026
content: Đó là một trong những nội dung tại buổi làm việc giữa Thường trực Tỉnh ủy Lào Cai và Tổng công ty Đầu tư phát triển đường cao tốc Việt Nam (VEC) về Dự án xây dựng, mở rộng đoạn Yên Bái - Lào Cai thuộc tuyến cao tốc Nội Bài - Lào Cai . Tỉnh Lào Cai và Tổng công ty Đầu tư phát triển đường cao tốc Việt Nam (VEC) làm việc về Dự án xây dựng, mở rộng đoạn Yên Bái - Lào Cai thuộc tuyến cao tốc Nội Bài - Lào Cai . Ảnh: Thanh Huyền Theo đó, Dự án xây dựng , mở rộng đoạn Yên Bái - Lào Cai sẽ nâng quy mô từ 2 lên 4 làn xe, chiều dài khoảng 121,33 km. Điểm đầu tại Km123+080 (IC13) thuộc địa phận tỉnh Yên Bái (sau hợp nhất là tỉnh Lào Cai); điểm cuối tại Km244+155 (IC18) thuộc tỉnh Lào Cai. Phạm vi giải phóng mặt bằng cơ bản đã thực hiện từ giai đoạn 1, đủ điều kiện mở rộng 4 làn xe. Riêng một số hạng mục như đường dẫn hầm, hầm xuyên núi, đường gom dân sinh bổ sung sẽ cần giải phóng mặt bằng thêm. Dự án dự kiến tổng mức đầu tư khoảng 7.668 tỷ đồng, trong đó vốn ngân sách Nhà nước 3.055 tỷ đồng, vốn VEC huy động 4.613 tỷ đồng. Thời gian triển khai từ 2025 - 2027, dự kiến khởi công trong năm 2025 và cơ bản hoàn thành trong năm 2026 theo chỉ đạo của Thủ tướng Chính phủ. Đại diện đơn vị tư...

title: Xe khách cháy trơ khung trên quốc lộ, 27 hành khách thoát nạn trong gang tấc
content: Sáng 10/7, Công an tỉnh Lâm Đồng cho biết đang làm rõ nguyên nhân vụ cháy xe khách trên quốc lộ 1, đoạn qua xã Hồng Sơn (xã Hồng Liêm, huyện Hàm Thuận Bắc, Bình Thuận cũ). Xe khách bốc cháy dữ dội. Video: Người dân cung cấp. Theo thông tin ban đầu, khoảng 22h30 tối 9/7, chiếc xe khách giường nằm 36 chỗ do tài xế Nguyễn Văn Việt (47 tuổi, quê Hải Phòng) cầm lái chở 27 người chạy trên quốc lộ 1, chạy hướng Bắc - Nam. Khi chạy đến đoạn Km 1672 Quốc lộ 1, xã Hồng Sơn, tỉnh Lâm Đồng thì lửa bốc cháy từ khoang để đồ, sau đó lan ra toàn bộ xe. Chiếc xe cháy trơ khung. Ảnh: Anh Kiệt. Ngọn lửa nhanh chóng bùng phát mạnh và nhanh chóng bao trùm toàn xe, nhưng may mắn toàn bộ hành khách đã kịp thoát ra ngoài. Nhận được tin báo, Công an tỉnh Lâm Đồng đã huy động lực lượng cảnh sát phòng cháy chữa cháy và xe chuyên dụng đến hiện trường dập lửa. Hiện nguyên nhân vụ cháy đang được điều tra, làm rõ.

title: Chủ động phòng ngừa và điều trị biến chứng loãng xương ở người cao tuổi
content: Theo số liệu từ Hội Loãng xương TP.HCM, hiện có khoảng 3,6 triệu người tại Việt Nam đang gặp phải tình trạng loãng xương. Tuy nhiên, phần lớn chỉ được phát hiện, chẩn đoán khi bệnh đã tiến triển nặng, thậm chí xuất hiện biến chứng nghiêm trọng như xẹp đốt sống. Tình trạng này không chỉ gây đau lưng dữ dội, biến dạng cột sống, giảm chiều cao mà còn làm suy giảm chức năng vận động, ảnh hưởng đến sinh hoạt hằng ngày, có thể trở thành gánh nặng cho gia đình. Xẹp đốt sống do loãng xương gây đau lưng dữ dội, hạn chế vận động Mặc dù tỷ lệ xẹp đốt sống do loãng xương ở người cao tuổi đang ngày càng gia tăng nhưng thực tế cho thấy nhiều người vẫn chủ quan, chưa nhận biết được các dấu hiệu cảnh báo sớm hoặc thiếu kiến thức về cách phòng ngừa và điều trị xẹp đốt sống an toàn, hiệu quả. Cùng với đó, việc tự điều trị bằng thuốc giảm đau hoặc can thiệp điều trị biến chứng muộn dẫn đến: mất vững, biến dạng (gù , vẹo) cột sống, tăng nguy cơ xẹp nhiều đốt sống. Nhằm nâng cao nhận thức cộng đồng, đặc biệt trong nhóm người cao tuổi, ngày 19/07/2025, Bệnh viện Đa khoa Hồng Ngọc Phúc Trường Minh phối hợp cùng Công ty TNHH Medtronic Việt Nam tổ chức chương trình tư...

title: Biến chứng kép tim mạch – võng mạc ở bệnh nhân tiểu đường: Có thể ngăn chặn từ sớm
content: TS. BS Nguyễn Quốc Thái (Viện Tim mạch – Bệnh viện Bạch Mai) nhấn mạnh: “Ngay cả khi kiểm soát tốt các chỉ số như LDL-C, huyết áp và đường huyết, người bệnh đái tháo đường vẫn phải đối mặt với nguy cơ tim mạch tồn dư, đặc biệt nếu có tăng triglyceride hoặc non-HDL-C cao”. Non-HDL-C là một chỉ số lipid máu quan trọng, ngày càng được khuyến cáo trong điều trị rối loạn mỡ máu, cần kiểm soát song song với LDL-C và triglyceride để giảm biến cố tim mạch. Trong khi đó, biến chứng võng mạc đái tháo đường (VMĐTĐ) cũng được xem là yếu tố cảnh báo sớm về diễn tiến nặng của bệnh. Theo thống kê, cứ 3 người mắc ĐTĐ thì có ít nhất 1 người bị VMĐTĐ. Đây là nguyên nhân hàng đầu gây mù ở người trong độ tuổi lao động và ảnh hưởng nghiêm trọng đến chất lượng cuộc sống. Theo BSCKII. Nguyễn Thị Thu (Khoa Nội tiết – Đái tháo đường , Bệnh viện Bạch Mai), dù đã kiểm soát tốt các yếu tố nguy cơ, nghiên cứu Steno-2 vẫn cho thấy 50% bệnh nhân đái tháo đường tiến triển sang VMĐTĐ sau 8 năm. “Điều này cho thấy cần có giải pháp điều trị chủ động và can thiệp sớm hơn, không thể chỉ trông chờ vào kiểm soát đường huyết hay huyết áp đơn thuần”, bà nói. VMĐTĐ gây ra hậu quả nghiêm trọng đối với sức khỏe...

title: Tiểu thương ở chợ Phùng Khoang bức xúc vì bị 'vạ lây' vụ thịt lợn nhiễm dịch tả lợn châu Phi
content: Chợ Phùng Khoang . Vừa qua, Công an TP Hà Nội bắt giữ 4 đối tượng liên quan đến đường dây giết mổ, tiêu thụ thịt lợn nhiễm dịch tả lợn châu Phi . Đáng chú ý, theo thông tin cơ quan công an cung cấp, cơ quan chức năng thu giữ tại 4 kiot ở chợ Phùng Khoang 977kg thịt lợn không có giấy tờ kiểm dịch, không có giấy tờ chứng minh nguồn gốc xuất xứ, trị giá hơn 97 triệu đồng. Kết quả xét nghiệm cho thấy các mẫu thịt và nội tạng dương tính với virus dịch tả lợn châu Phi. Ghi nhận của phóng viên tại chợ Phùng Khoang, nhiều tiểu thương buôn bán ở đây xôn xao về vụ việc kể trên. Các tiểu thương chỉ tận nơi những đối tượng bán thịt lợn bệnh nằm ở phía ngoài cổng sau chợ. Họ phản ánh việc buôn bán hàng không rõ nguồn gốc phía sau chợ diễn ra thời gian dài nhưng chưa được xử lý quyết liệt. cảnh nhếch nhác tại khu vực tự phát bên ngoài cổng sau chợ Phùng Khoang. Một tiểu thương buôn bán gần đó xin được giấu tên cho biết, cứ khoảng 21 - 22 giờ hằng ngày, hoặc 1-2 giờ sáng là thời điểm giao thoa chợ đêm, xe tải lại lén lút tập kết thịt, mỡ, nội tạng lợn nghi nhiễm bệnh từ nhiều nơi về đây. “Họ vứt từng tảng thịt xuống đất, giẫm cả chân lên. Mùi hôi nồng nặc. Cả chợ này...

title: Yêu cầu làm rõ đồng phạm giúp sức cựu Phó giám đốc chi nhánh Eximbank lừa đảo 2.700 tỷ đồng
content: Có đồng phạm giúp sức Sau hơn ngày xét xử, TAND TP Hà Nội trả hồ sơ vụ án cựu Phó giám đốc Ngân hàng Eximbank chi nhánh Ba Đình lừa đảo 2.700 tỷ đồng. Đây là lần thứ 2, tòa trả hồ sơ. Lần trả này tòa cho rằng, bị cáo có đồng phạm giúp sức; cần xác minh thêm thông tin số tiền bị cáo chiếm đoạt, số tiền người liên quan hưởng lợi; hồ sơ vụ án còn thiếu chứng cứ, nên cần điều tra bổ sung. Trong vụ án, bị cáo Vũ Thị Thu Nhung (SN 1977) bị quy kết phạm các tội “Lừa đảo chiếm đoạt tài sản” và “Làm giả tài liệu của cơ quan, tổ chức”. Hồ sơ vụ án thể hiện, ngày 12/6/2022, Cơ quan CSĐT Công an quận Cầu Giấy (cũ), nhận đơn bà Nguyễn Thị H. (SN 1979, trú tại phường Tương Mai, quận Hoàng Mai) tố cáo Nhung có hành vi lừa đảo chiếm đoạt hơn 23 tỷ đồng thông qua hành vi làm giả các “Chứng chỉ tiền gửi có kỳ hạn rút vốn linh hoạt tại Ngân hàng Eximbank”. Quá trình điều tra, Cơ quan chức năng nhận thêm đơn của nhiều cá nhân tố cáo Nhung chiếm đoạt tiền . Viện kiểm sát xác định, năm 2013, Nhung được bổ nhiệm làm Phó Giám đốc Ngân hàng Eximbank - Chi nhánh Ba Đình . Bị cáo được giao phụ trách huy động vốn khách hàng cá nhân. Từ 2014, do cần tiền trả nợ và chi tiêu, Nhung thông tin gian dối việc Eximbank...

title: HLV Enrique: ‘Hãy trao Quả bóng Vàng cho Dembele’
content: Trở lại đội hình xuất phát lần đầu tiên tại FIFA Club World Cup 2025 sau chấn thương đùi, Dembele lập tức tỏa sáng trong trận đại chiến với Real Madrid ở bán kết trên sân MetLife, East Rutherford (New Jersey). Ngôi sao người Pháp kiến tạo cho Fabian Ruiz mở tỷ số ngay phút thứ 6, trước khi tự mình nhân đôi cách biệt chỉ ba phút sau đó, góp công lớn vào chiến thắng hủy diệt 4-0 của PSG. “Đây là trận đầu tiên tôi có Dembele ở thể trạng tốt nhất", HLV Enrique chia sẻ sau trận. “Cậu ấy là một cầu thủ đặc biệt, một nhân tố định đoạt trận đấu và là niềm mong chờ của mọi cổ động viên. Tôi hy vọng chúng tôi sẽ tiếp tục có cậu ấy trong trận chung kết". Trong trận bán kết rạng sáng nay, PSG thắng 4-0 với bàn thắng của Dembele, cú đúp của Fabian Ruiz cùng pha lập công ấn định tỷ số 4-0 của Ramos. Với thắng lợi vang dội này, PSG tiến vào chung kết gặp Chelsea, vẫn tại MetLife, vào lúc 2h sáng ngày 14/7, theo giờ Việt Nam. Nếu đánh bại đại diện nước Anh, PSG sẽ hoàn tất một mùa giải lịch sử, sau khi đã vô địch Ligue 1, Cúp Quốc gia Pháp , Siêu cúp Pháp và Champions League. “Chúng tôi chỉ còn cách lịch sử đúng một trận đấu để giành được tất cả các danh hiệu mùa này", HLV Enrique nhấn mạnh. “Điều đó mang ý...

title: Bentley hé lộ xe điện siêu sang chỉ có 3 chỗ ngồi
content: Bentley EXP 15 Concept sở hữu kiểu dáng pha trộn giữa coupe , sedan và cả chất crossover. Thiết kế ngoại thất cũng khác biệt hoàn toàn so với những mẫu Bentley hiện hành. Mẫu xe concept sở hữu phần đầu nổi bật với mặt ca-lăng lớn, kín và tích hợp dải đèn LED mô phỏng họa tiết lưới tản nhiệt truyền thống của Bentley . Một số chi tiết đáng chú ý khác gồm cụm đèn pha dọc, logo cánh chim mới và biểu tượng chữ B gắn trên nắp capo phát sáng. Mui xe làm phẳng, nối liền với cột A màu đen dốc về phía sau. Thân xe được tạo hình cơ bắp với đường gân chạy ngang hông. Xe có bộ mâm khí động học cùng khoảng sáng gầm cao. Phần đuôi xe có 2 cánh gió chủ động đặt cao, bộ khuếch tán gió và đèn hậu kiểu xe đua. Một trong những điểm phá cách trên Bentley EXP 15 đó là thiết kế 3 cửa: một bên lái và hai cửa bên phụ. Đặc biệt, dù có hai cửa trước nhưng xe chỉ trang bị một ghế trước duy nhất. Thay vào đó, khoảng trống ở ghế phụ phía trước được tận dụng làm chỗ để hành lý hoặc giường cho thú cưng. Bentley chưa công bố nhiều thông số nhưng xác nhận rằng mẫu concept có chiều dài hơn 5.000 mm, nhỏ hơn Flying Spur nhưng vẫn hứa hẹn cho một không gian nội thất rộng rãi. Ghế hành khách phía sau có...

title: Chủ tịch Quốc hội: Chuẩn bị từ sớm để đảm bảo chất lượng kỳ họp cuối nhiệm kỳ
content: Sáng 10/7, phát biểu khai mạc phiên họp thứ 47 của Ủy ban Thường vụ Quốc hội , Chủ tịch Quốc hội Trần Thanh Mẫn cho biết, phiên họp sẽ diễn ra trong 1 ngày, cho ý kiến vào 8 nội dung chính. Trong đó, Ủy ban Thường vụ Quốc hội sẽ cho ý kiến bước đầu về dự thảo báo cáo kết quả giám sát chuyên đề: Việc thực hiện chính sách, pháp luật về phát triển và sử dụng nguồn nhân lực đáp ứng yêu cầu phát triển kinh tế - xã hội, nhất là nguồn nhân lực chất lượng cao. Chủ tịch Quốc hội Trần Thanh Mẫn phát biểu tại phiên họp. Ảnh: QH Chuyên đề giám sát này rất thiết thực và có ý nghĩa chiến lược trong bối cảnh đất nước bước vào giai đoạn mới, cần nguồn nhân lực chất lượng cao làm nền tảng cho tăng trưởng nhanh, bền vững. Bộ Chính trị cũng cho ý kiến về nghị quyết tập trung phát triển giáo dục và đào tạo cũng như nghị quyết liên quan chăm sóc sức khỏe cho nhân dân. "Chúng ta sẽ có 6 nghị quyết và vừa qua đã triển khai 4 nghị quyết quan trọng của Bộ Chính trị. Quốc hội đã thông qua 3 nghị quyết về khoa học, đổi mới sáng tạo, chuyển đổi số; nghị quyết về xây dựng , thực thi pháp luật; nghị quyết về phát triển kinh tế tư nhân. Đây là các nghị quyết rất quan trọng", Chủ tịch...

title: Tỉnh Lào Cai mới quyết tâm trở thành trung tâm du lịch của vùng Tây Bắc
content: Theo báo cáo của Sở Văn hóa, Thể thao và Du lịch tỉnh Lào Cai, nhận thức và tư duy phát triển du lịch của một số địa phương trên địa bàn còn hạn chế; việc định hướng tiệm cận tiêu chuẩn quốc tế chưa thực sự rõ ràng. Công tác xúc tiến, khảo sát nhu cầu thị trường quốc tế còn chưa tương xứng với tiềm năng, khiến Lào Cai chưa tận dụng hết cơ hội tiếp cận các thị trường khách mới. Sáu tháng đầu năm 2025, tổng lượng khách du lịch đến Lào Cai đạt 7,3 triệu lượt, tổng thu hơn 21.000 tỷ đồng. Một trở ngại lớn khác của du lịch Lào Cai là hạ tầng giao thông, đặc biệt là kết nối hàng không còn yếu; dịch vụ hỗ trợ chưa đồng bộ, giá thành sản phẩm và chất lượng dịch vụ chưa thực sự nổi trội so với các điểm đến trong nước và quốc tế. Trong số hơn 35.000 lao động ngành du lịch, tỷ lệ lao động có trình độ cao đẳng, đại học chỉ chiếm khoảng 21%, còn lại phần lớn là lao động phổ thông. Nguồn lực đầu tư phát triển vẫn chưa đủ mạnh để giải quyết tình trạng xuống cấp hạ tầng, ô nhiễm môi trường, và suy giảm giá trị di sản, nhất là tại các điểm đến trọng điểm như Sa Pa, Bắc Hà, Mù Cang Chải . Trong khi đó, tác động từ thiên tai, biến đổi khí hậu, dịch bệnh cũng đòi hỏi...

title: Tiềm năng du lịch ‘rừng vàng, biển bạc’ của tỉnh Gia Lai mới
content: Mở ra một không gian phát triển mới Tại hội nghị, bà Đỗ Thị Diệu Hạnh - Giám đốc Sở VH-TT&DL tỉnh Gia Lai đã chia sẻ những tiềm năng, lợi thế du lịch của tỉnh Gia Lai mới sau hợp nhất. Theo bà Hạnh, tỉnh Gia Lai mới thành lập mở ra một không gian phát triển mới, toàn diện và sâu rộng cho vùng đất giàu bản sắc văn hóa, giàu tài nguyên du lịch và đầy khát vọng vươn lên. Bà Đỗ Thị Diệu Hạnh - Giám đốc Sở VH-TT&DL tỉnh Gia Lai phát biểu tại hội nghị Với tiềm năng lợi thế “rừng vàng, biển bạc”, tỉnh Gia Lai hiện nay sở hữu hệ sinh thái du lịch độc đáo, kết hợp hài hòa giữa du lịch biển nghỉ dưỡng tại Quy Nhơn, Kỳ Co - Eo Gió với du lịch sinh thái, văn hóa cồng chiêng Tây Nguyên, khám phá đại ngàn Kon Ka Kinh, Biển Hồ... Cùng với hệ thống giao thông đồng bộ với cảng biển, sân bay, cao tốc, cửa khẩu tạo điều kiện thuận lợi để kết nối liên vùng, mở rộng thị trường và phát triển các sản phẩm du lịch đa dạng, có chiều sâu. Dư địa phát triển du lịch của tỉnh rất lớn, không chỉ về tài nguyên mà còn ở khả năng hình thành các chuỗi giá trị: từ nông nghiệp kết hợp du lịch, du lịch thông minh đến phát triển các điểm đến đẳng cấp quốc tế. Đây là cơ hội để du lịch Gia Lai vươn lên...

title: FCSB - Inter d’Escaldes: 'Rezultatul este unul bun, dar nu sunt mulţumit de evoluţia noastră' - Elias Charalambous
content: Tehnicianul echipei FCSB , Elias Charalambous, a declarat miercuri seară, după meciul cu Inter Escaldes, scor 3-1, că rezultatul este unul bun, dar el nu este mulţumit de evoluţia formaţiei bucureştene, informează news.ro. ”Cred că rezultatul este unul bun, dar nu sunt mulţumit de evoluţia noastră. Am zis înainte de meci că, dacă nu suntem concentraţi 100%, vom avea probleme. Ştiam că adversarul joacă fotbal, că e o echipă mult mai bună decât ce se vorbeşte despre ea. I-am analizat, au o posesie bună. Am avut ocazii să mai marcăm, dar n-am făcut-o şi am suferit. E responsabilitatea mea că nu am jucat mai bine azi, eu trebuia să-i împing pe jucători. Nu trebuie să arătăm cu degetul vreun jucător, toţi trebuie să fim mai concentraţi. Ăsta este rezultatul, trebuie să ne îmbunătăţim ca echipă şi sunt convins că o vom face. Nu e un accident. Am câştigat, totuşi. Am spus că puteam să jucăm mai bine. E adevărat, nu am făcut un joc fantastic, dar am câştigat cu 3-1”, a spus Elias Charalambous , potrivit Digi Sport. Echipa bucureşteană FCSB a învins miercuri seara, pe teren propriu, scor 3-1, formaţia andorrană Inter Club d’Escaldes în prima manşă a turului întâi din calificările Ligii Campionilor.

title: VIDEO Furt din Casa Domnului: Ucraineancă reținută după ce a sustras bani din altarul unei biserici din București
content: O ucraineancă a fost reținută de polițiștii din București sub acuzația de furt calificat. Ea este suspectată că a furat bani din altarul unei biserici . Poliţiștii Secției 12 a Poliției Capitalei au reținut o femeie din Ucraina care este cercetată într-un dosar penal privind săvârșirea infracțiunii de furt calificat. „În fapt, la data de 7 iulie 2025, poliţiști din cadrul Secţiei 12 Poliție au fost sesizați, de către reprezentantul unei biserici, din Sectorul 3, cu privire la faptul că, în data de 30 iunie a.c., din altarul lăcașului de cult, ar fi fost sustrași 1.300 de lei, bani aparținând bisericii, precum și 300 de lei, sumă ce aparținea unei persoane. Din cercetările și investigațiile efectuate, s-a stabilit că fapta ar fi fost comisă de către o femeie, cetățean ucrainean. La data de 8 iulie 2025, bănuita a fost depistată și condusă la audieri. În baza probatoriului administrat, cea în cauză a fost reținută pentru 24 de ore, urmând a fi prezentată magistraților cu propunere legală”, a transmis Poliția Capitalei. Cercetările sunt continuate de către Secția 12 Poliție, sub supravegherea Parchetului de pe lângă Judecătoria Sectorului 3, sub aspectul săvârşirii infracţiunii de furt calificat.

title: ગુજરાતમાં આજે 4 જિલ્લામાં ભારે વરસાદને લઈ યલો એલર્ટ જાહેર, માછીમારોને દરિયો ન ખેડવા સૂચના
creator: Vimal Prajapati
content: અમદાવાદઃ ગુજરાતમાં ચોમાસું શરૂ થયું ત્યારથી સતત વરસાદ વરસી રહ્યો છે. હજી પણ હવામાન વિભાગ દ્વારા આગામી 7 દિવસ માટે વરસાદની આગાહી કરવામાં આવી છે. આજે દક્ષિણના જિલ્લાઓના કેટલાક વિસ્તારમાં છૂટોછવાયો થવાની આગાહી કરવામાં આવી છે. કેટલાક જિલ્લાઓ હવામાન વિભાગ દ્વારા વરસાદની આગાહીને લઈને યલો એલર્ટ જાહેર કરવામાં આવ્યું છે. જેથી આગામી 3 દિવસ માછીમારોને દરિયો ન ખેડવા સૂચના આપવામાં આવી છે.છૂટાછવાયા સ્થળોએ ભારે વરસાદને લઈને યલો એલર્ટહવામાન વિભાગ દ્વારા આજે 10મી જુલાઈના રોજ વલસાડ, નવસારી, દમણ અને દાદરા નગરહવેલીમાં છૂટાછવાયા સ્થળોએ ભારે વરસાદને લઈને યલો એલર્ટ કરવામાં આવ્યું છે. એટલા માટે 40થી 50 કિ.મી પ્રતિ કલાકની ઝડપે પવન ફૂંકાવાની શક્યતા હોવાથી માછીમારોને દરિયામાં ના જવાની સૂચના આપવામાં આવી છે. આજે અમદાવાદ શહેરમાં પણ વાદળછાયું વાતાવરણ જોવા મળ્યું છે. જેના કારણે હળવા વરસાદની શક્યતાઓ વર્તાઈ રહી છે. દક્ષિણના જિલ્લાઓમાં 17મી જુલાઈ સુધી હળવા વરસાદની આગાહી કરવામાં આવી છે. આ દરમિયાન સૌરાષ્ટ્રમાં પણ ભારે વરસાદની આગાહી કરવામાં આવી છે. જેથી દરિયાકાંઠાની નજીકના વિસ્તારોમાં 10 જુલાઇ બાદ વરસાદનું જોર ઘટી શકે છે.છેલ્લા 24 કલાકમાં 126 તાલુકામાં સારો એવો વરસાદ નોંધાયોગુજરાતમાં છેલ્લા 24 કલાકમાં 126 તાલુકામાં સારો એવો વરસાદ નોંધાયો છે. છેલ્લા 24 કલાકમાં સૌથી વધુ તાપીના કુકરમુંડામાં 2.40 ઇંચ, નિઝરમાં 2.5 ઇંચ અને સુરતના ઉમરપાડામાં 1.57 ઇંચ વરસાદ નોંધાયો છે. ખાસ કરીને વાત કરવામાં આવે તો મોટાભાગની જિલ્લામાં સારો વરસાદ થયો છે. ગુજરાતમાં સર્વત્ર વરસાદની વાત કરવામાં આવે તો, ગુજરાતમાં જૂન મહિનામાં સરેરાશ 4.43 ઇંચ વરસાદની જરૂરિયાત હોય છે, તેની સામે ગુજરાતમાં સરેરાશ 11.55 ઇંચ વરસાદ ખાબક્યો છે. વરસાદના કારણે અનેક...

title: Nunțile au devenit o mare sursă de stres pentru români: ce îi deranjează cel mai mult pe invitați
content: Suma din plicul de nuntă a devenit o sursă de stres pentru mulți români. Aproape 3 din 4 participanți la astfel de evenimente spun că se simt presați să cheltuiască mai mult decât și-ar permite. Între dorința de a onora invitația și realitatea financiară, românii jonglează cu așteptările mirilor, obiceiuri costisitoare și influențele sociale. Mai ales tinerii resimt presiunea, iar mulți ajung să regrete participarea doar din cauza banilor. Un sondaj recent arată cât mai oferă, ce tradiții îi deranjează și cum încearcă să gestioneze cheltuielile. Bani puși în plic cu inima strânsă Potrivit unui sondaj realizat în iunie 2025 de Dynata la comanda Revolut, cheltuielile românilor cu participarea la o nuntă sunt considerabile. Aproape 30% cheltuiesc între 301 și 500 de euro, iar 27% ajung la sume între 501 și 1.000 de euro pentru dar, ținută, transport și alte cheltuieli. Un sfert dintre respondenți spun că limita lor rezonabilă e între 101 și 300 de euro. Tinerii sunt cei mai afectați: 19% dintre cei între 18 și 24 de ani și 17% dintre cei între 25 și 34 de ani spun că mereu simt presiunea de a cheltui peste posibilități. Presiunea socială din partea familiei și prietenilor (28%) sau dorința de a fi alături de cuplu într-un moment unic (27%) sunt principalele motive pentru care românii forțează limitele bugetului. În plus, cultura comparației de pe rețelele sociale influențează 6% din respondenți, procent...

title: Kinh hoàng hiện trường cầu sập khiến xe tải treo lơ lửng, hàng loạt phương tiện rơi xuống sông
content: Ngày 9/7, một vụ sập cầu đã xảy ra tại quận Vadodara, bang Gujarat (Ấn Độ), cướp đi sinh mạng của ít nhất 9 người, theo . 9 người khác đã được cứu sống sau khi 5 phương tiện rơi xuống sông Mahisagar. Hình ảnh từ hiện trường cho thấy một chiếc xe tải treo lơ lửng giữa phần cầu bị gãy, bên cạnh đó là cảnh tượng toàn bộ phiến cầu giữa hai trụ cầu đã sụp đổ. 5 phương tiện bao gồm 2 xe tải, 2 xe van và 1 xe lam ba bánh đã rơi xuống sông sau khi cầu Gambhira sập. Ông Anil Dhameliya, người đứng đầu quận Vadodara, xác nhận thông tin trên. Sau 8 giờ đồng hồ, chiếc xe bồn vẫn mắc kẹt trên phần cầu bị gãy. Tài xế xe bồn may mắn thoát nạn nhưng hiện vẫn chưa rõ tung tích. Những hình ảnh tại hiện trường Thủ tướng Narendra Modi đã bày tỏ sự thương tiếc trước những người thiệt mạng: Thủ tướng Modi cũng cầu chúc những người bị thương sớm bình phục. Lực lượng cứu hộ đang nỗ lực trục vớt một chiếc xe tải khác bị rơi xuống sông Mahisagar. Một chiếc cần cẩu và ba máy xúc JCB đã được huy động nhưng đến nay vẫn chưa thể di chuyển được chiếc xe. Cầu Gambhira được khởi công xây dựng vào năm 1981 và đưa vào sử dụng năm 1985. Năm 2017, Đảng Quốc đại đã yêu cầu đóng cửa cầu đối với xe...

title: トランプ大統領「8月1日から銅に50%」追加関税を表明 医薬品に対しても200%の関税課す方針
content: アメリカのトランプ大統領は9日輸入する銅に対し、8月1日から50%の関税を課すことを明らかにしました。 トランプ大統領はSNSで、自動車や鉄鋼・アルミニウムに続く分野別の追加関税の対象を広げ、輸入する銅に対し8月1日から50%の関税を課すことを表明しました。 トランプ氏はその理由について「半導体や航空機、リチウムイオン電池、ミサイル防衛システムなど重要な産業に不可欠な素材だ」と説明しました。そのうえで「国防総省で2番目に多く使用される素材だ」とも訴え、銅の生産を国内回帰させる意義を強調しました。 トランプ氏は銅に加えて、医薬品に対しても200%の関税を課す方針を表明しています。 フジテレビ報道局が全国、世界の重要ニュースから身近な話題まで様々な情報を速報・詳報含めて発信します。 世界では今何が起きているのか――ワシントン、ニューヨーク、ロサンゼルス、ロンドン、パリ、モスクワ、イスタンブール、北京、上海、ソウル、バンコクのFNN11支局を拠点に、国際情勢や各国の事件・事故、政治、経済、社会問題から文化・エンタメまで海外の最新ニュースをお届けします。

title: מיליון חביות ביום: מהפכת הנפט החדשה של עיראק יוצאת לדרך
creator: מערכת ישראל היום
content: ראש ממשלת עיראק, מוחמד שיעה אל-סודאני, השיק אמש (רביעי) את יישום פרויקט הרחבת בית הזיקוק לנפט גולמי בעיר נג'ף עם קיבולת כוללת של 100,000 חביות ליום. כושר הייצור הנוכחי של בית הזיקוק בנג'ף הוא 30,000 חביות ליום, ועוד 70,000 חביות ליום יתווספו כחלק מתוכנית הרחבה חדשה להוספת קיבולות ויחידות חדשות לייצור נגזרות נפט כדי לענות על צרכי הצריכה המקומית. ביום שני הודיע אל-סודאני על השקת עבודות הביצוע של פרויקט הרחבת בית הזיקוק "דיוואניה", שיזקק נפט גולמי בקיבולת של 70,000 חביות ליום ובעלות של 800,000 דולר. הדבר יגדיל את סך התפוקה של בית הזיקוק ל-90,000 חביות ליום תוך מספר שנים, על פי סוכנות הידיעות הגרמנית DPA. עיראק מתכוונת ליישם תוכנית שמטרתה להסיט 40% מתפוקת הנפט במדינה לתעשיות זיקוק כדי לענות על הביקוש המקומי. מספר בתי זיקוק עיראקיים במחוזות סלאח אל-דין, נג'ף, דיוואניה, מייסאן ובצרה מיישמים כעת פרויקטים להרחבת כושר הזיקוק, שמטרתם להפוך את עיראק מיבואנית מוצרי נפט ליצואנית. זאת למעט יבוא בנזין, שצפוי להסתיים השנה. ממשלת עיראק הודיעה בתוכנית הפיתוח הלאומית שלה לשנים 2024-2028 כי היא פועלת להגדלת כושר זיקוק הנפט הגולמי מכ-700,000 חביות ליום ל-1.25 מיליון חביות ליום עד 2028, תוך השגת עצמאות ויצוא נגזרות לחו"ל. טעינו? נתקן! אם מצאתם טעות בכתבה, נשמח שתשתפו אותנו

title: זוהה שיגור מתימן; אזעקות נשמעו ברחבי הארץ; הטיל יורט בהצלחה
creator: לילך שובל
content: צה''ל זיהה בשעות הבוקר (חמישי) כי שוגר טיל מכיוון תימן אל עבר שטח ישראל. מערכות ההגנה פעלו ליירט את האיום, ואכן חיל האוויר יירט את הטיל בהצלחה. { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "VideoObject", "id": "0_f4lenV9fo7TE0FT5ep", "name": "\u05e9\u05d9\u05d2\u05d5\u05e8 \u05de\u05ea\u05d9\u05de\u05df, \u05e9\u05de\u05d9 \u05e9\u05db\u05dd\\\\ 27\u05d0", "description": "\u05e9\u05d9\u05d2\u05d5\u05e8 \u05de\u05ea\u05d9\u05de\u05df, \u05e9\u05de\u05d9 \u05e9\u05db\u05dd", "contentUrl": "https://www.israelhayom.co.il/webplayer/pla/0_f4lenV9fo7TE0FT5ep", "thumbnailUrl": "https://gw2.l7cdn.com/ih/WhatsApp_Video_2025-07-10_at_05.26.05-ingest-516148/poster0.png", "uploadDate": "2025-07-10T02:36:25+00:00" } שיגור מתימן, שמי שכם | לפי סעיף 27א לפני הישמע האזעקות, יצאה הודעה מקדימה מטעם פיקוד העורף על אזעקות שצפויות להישמע בדקות הקרובות באזור השומרון, שפלת יהודה, יהודה, שרון, ירושלים, דן ולכיש. לאחר מספר דקות נשמעו האזעקות ברחבי הארץ. לא התקבלו קריאות במוקד 101 של מגן דוד אדום לא על נפילות, רסיסים או על נפגעים. { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "VideoObject", "id": "0_itt2h6ilPUgE0FUKxk", "name": "\u05ea\u05d9\u05e2\u05d5\u05d3 \u05d4\u05d8\u05d9\u05dc \u05e9\u05e9\u05d5\u05d2\u05e8 \u05de\u05ea\u05d9\u05de\u05df \u05d0\u05dc \u05e2\u05d1\u05e8 \u05d9\u05e9\u05e8\u05d0\u05dc\\\\ \u05e2\u05d5\u05e4\u05e8 \u05e9\u05d7\u05e8", "description": "\u05ea\u05d9\u05e2\u05d5\u05d3 \u05d4\u05d8\u05d9\u05dc \u05e9\u05e9\u05d5\u05d2\u05e8 \u05de\u05ea\u05d9\u05de\u05df \u05d0\u05dc...

title: 2025-26 NBA Cup group draw & reactions | Sporting News
creator: Alex Walsh
content: The NBA Cup will take place for the third season in a row, in the upcoming 2025-26 season. On Wednesday, the teams were revealed for each of the six groups. What are the six groups? Each conference has three groups with five teams per group. East Group A Hawks Cavs Pacers Raptors Wizards East Group B Celtics Nets Pistons Magic 76ers East Group C Hornets Bulls Heat Bucks Knicks At a quick glance, Group B looks like the most competitive group in the East. Outside of maybe the Nets, all four other teams are likely to be playoff teams come next Spring. The Magic and Pistons are bound for big years after strong 2024-25 campaigns, and the 76ers will be back healthy with some new additions. Group C appears to favor the Knicks, but the Bucks and Heat could always make a run at winning the group. The Hawks and Cavs stand out in Group A as the two front-runners, as we don't completely know how to judge the Pacers for next season as of right now. West Group A Timberwolves Thunder Suns Kings Jazz West Group B Mavericks Clippers Lakers Grizzlies Pelicans West Group C Nuggets Warriors Rockets Trail Blazers Spurs Starting with Group A, the Timberwolves and Thunder stand out as the two representatives from the 2025 WCF. The Jazz are in a rebuild, but you never know what you'll get out of the Kings and maybe even the Suns. Group B features a new-look Mavs team along with a revamped Clippers roster. The Lakers are there too, which, of course, is significant, along with the Grizzlies. Group C...
